h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Not far after them, you'll encounter an Enslaved Yaksha. You can think of him as the Frozen Corpse in his prime, as he uses a similar very long sword, and can sweep in wide arcs with it, or thrust forward with a huge amount of reach. Luckily, his attacks are all very slow, and easily baited into a Rock Solid deflection.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Lower Pagoda (Level 2)'.
The content is as follows:
Not far after them, you'll encounter an Enslaved Yaksha. You can think of him as the Frozen Corpse in his prime, as he uses a similar very long sword, and can sweep in wide arcs with it, or thrust forward with a huge amount of reach. Luckily, his attacks are all very slow, and easily baited into a Rock Solid deflection.
